appendText.text:
Soul of the product: Grippy PU surface for non-slip performance even with sweat Wider than traditional mats for extra space Arch shaped Mat Tree rubber bottom provides secure floor grip 5mm high rubber density for joint cushioning Free from harmful silicone, phthalates, PVC, and chemicals Ideal for both regular and hot yoga sessions Excellent durability for long-lasting use Material:

Recycled PU Leather, 100% natural tree rubber, water based inks

Care guide: We recommend you clean using a yoga mat cleaner. Spray clean the PU top and then wipe the mat. Let it Air Dry (Do not put in washer or dryer) Mindful craftsmanship:

PU is an artificial material made with split leather (the fibrous part of the hide left over from making leather) that does not involve animals and it is ethically sourced. We use recycled PU.

The other side of the mat is made with sustainably harvested tree rubber from rubber trees, a renewable resource. These mats don't contain any PVC, formaldehyde, or harmful chemicals making your mat both kind to you and kind to the earth.

Measurement: >Measurement

Free from harmful silicone, phthalates, PVC, and chemicals
Ideal for both regular and hot yoga sessions
Excellent durability for long-lasting use

appendText.text:
Soul of the product: 100% eco-friendly, sustainable and vegan materials Natural cork provides enhanced grip—even when wet providing non-slip performance High density rubber ensures joint-friendly cushioning Excellent durability, high quality, and free from harmful substances Versatile for regular and hot yoga sessions Anti-microbial cork surface for a hygienic environment Material:

Biodegradable, Recyclable, 100% natural tree rubber, water based inks with premium cork

The best thing: They come from the earth, they go back into the earth! The mat is 100% biodegradable, so by buying it you aren't increasing your carbon footprint.

Care guide: We recommend you clean using a yoga mat cleaner. Wipe it down with a yoga mat cleaner after your practice. Let it Air Dry (Do not put in Dryer) Mindful craftsmanship:

Cork is the outer bark of the Oak Tree. The Oak tree is never cut down to harvest cork, rather the bark is stripped by hand! No part of the bark is wasted during cork production. Oak trees regenerate their bark by absorbing five times more Carbon Dioxide than an oak tree that hasn't been harvested.

The other side of the mat is made with sustainably harvested tree rubber from rubber trees, a renewable resource. These mats don't contain any PVC, EVA or synthetic rubber making your mat both kind to you and kind to the earth.
All designs are made using water based inks to avoid chemicals
The best thing: They come from the earth, they go back into the earth! The mat is 100% biodegradable, so by buying it you aren't increasing your carbon footprint.

Measurement: >Measurement

Versatile for regular and hot yoga sessions
Anti-microbial cork surface for a hygienic environment

appendText.text:
Soul of the product: Sweat-activated grip 6mm cushioning for joint support Microfiber suede made from recycled plastic bottles Lightweight, and durable Skin-safe Ideal for both hot and regular yoga sessions
Material: TPE and microfiber suede Care guide: We recommend you clean using a yoga mat cleaner. Wipe it down with a yoga mat cleaner after your practice. Mindful craftsmanship:

The mats are manufactured in a way to ensure there are no toxic emissions released into the atmosphere. They are made from high-quality, eco-friendly TPE. Biodegradable and recyclable for a more sustainable option

The microfiber suede top is made from recycled plastic bottles that would otherwise end up in oceans or landfills. Approximately 18 disposable plastic bottles are used to make the vegan suede surface.
All designs are made using water based inks to avoid chemicals

Measurement: >Measurement

appendText.text:
Soul of the product: 100% eco-friendly, plant-based, and vegan Sweat-activated grip for non-slip performance Cushioned for joint support with non-slip rubber base Durable, high-quality, and sweat-wicking Free from silicone, phthalates, and harmful chemicals Ideal for hot yoga and high-intensity sessions Material:

Biodegradable, Recyclable, 100% natural tree rubber, water based inks with premium Hemp

The best thing: They come from the earth, they go back into the earth! The mat is 100% biodegradable, so by buying it you aren't increasing your carbon footprint.

Care guide: We recommend you clean using a yoga mat cleaner. Wipe it down with a yoga mat cleaner after your practice. Let it Air Dry (Do not put in Dryer) Mindful craftsmanship:

Hemp is a “bast fibre” which means it’s derived from the stems of plants such as flax, jute and stinging nettle. Hemp is gentle on the earth as it requires very little water. The other side of the mat is made with sustainably harvested tree rubber from rubber trees, a renewable resource. These mats don't contain any PVC, EVA or synthetic rubber making your mat both kind to you and kind to the earth.

The best thing: They come from the earth, they go back into the earth! The mat is 100% biodegradable, so by buying it you aren't increasing your carbon footprint.

Measurement: >Measurement

appendText.text:
Soul of the product: 100% eco-friendly, plant-based, and vegan Sweat-activated grip for non-slip performance Cushioned for joint support with non-slip rubber base Durable, high-quality, and sweat-wicking Free from silicone, phthalates, and harmful chemicals Ideal for hot yoga and high-intensity sessions Material: Biodegradable, Recyclable, 100% natural tree rubber, water based inks with premium Hemp Care guide: We recommend you clean using a yoga mat cleaner. Wipe it down with a yoga mat cleaner after your practice. Let it Air Dry (Do not put in Dryer) Mindful craftsmanship:

Hemp is a “bast fibre” which means it’s derived from the stems of plants such as flax, jute and stinging nettle. Hemp is gentle on the earth as it requires very little water. The other side of the mat is made with sustainably harvested tree rubber from rubber trees, a renewable resource. These mats don't contain any PVC, EVA or synthetic rubber making your mat both kind to you and kind to the earth.

The best thing: They come from the earth, they go back into the earth! The mat is 100% biodegradable, so by buying it you aren't increasing your carbon footprint.

Measurement: >Measurement

appendText.text:
Soul of the product: 100% eco-friendly, sustainable and vegan materials Natural cork provides enhanced grip—even when wet providing non-slip performance High density rubber ensures joint-friendly cushioning Excellent durability, high quality, and free from harmful substances Versatile for regular and hot yoga sessions Anti-microbial cork surface for a hygienic environment Material:

Biodegradable, Recyclable, 100% natural tree rubber, water based inks with premium cork

The Best Thing: They come from the earth, they go back into the earth! The mat is 100% biodegradable, so by buying it you aren't increasing your carbon footprint.

Care guide: We recommend you clean using a yoga mat cleaner. Wipe it down with a yoga mat cleaner after your practice. Let it Air Dry (Do not put in Dryer) Mindful craftsmanship:

Cork is the outer bark of the Oak Tree. The Oak tree is never cut down to harvest cork, rather the bark is stripped by hand! No part of the bark is wasted during cork production. Oak trees regenerate their bark by absorbing five times more Carbon Dioxide than an oak tree that hasn't been harvested.

The other side of the mat is made with sustainably harvested tree rubber from rubber trees, a renewable resource. These mats don't contain any PVC, EVA or synthetic rubber making your mat both kind to you and kind to the earth.
All designs are made using water based inks to avoid chemicals
The best thing: They come from the earth, they go back into the earth! The mat is 100% biodegradable, so by buying it you aren't increasing your carbon footprint.

Measurement: >Measurement

Free from toxins: no phthalates, latex, PVC, silicone, or glue

sections.heading: Material
items: Vegan suede top bonded to 100% recyclable and biodegradable, natural tree rubber
The Best Thing: They come from the earth, they go back into the earth! The mat is 100% biodegradable, so by buying it you aren't increasing your carbon footprint.

sections.heading: Care guide
items: We recommend you clean using a yoga mat cleaner. Wipe it down with a yoga mat cleaner after your practice. Let it Air Dry (Do not put in Dryer)

sections.heading: Mindful craftsmanship
items: The microfiber suede top is made from recycled plastic bottles that would otherwise end up in oceans or landfills. Approximately 18 disposable plastic bottles are used to make the vegan suede surface.

The other side of the mat is made with sustainably harvested tree rubber from rubber trees, a renewable resource. These mats don't contain any PVC, EVA or synthetic rubber making your mat both kind to you and kind to the earth.
All designs in water-based inks to avoid chemicals.

appendText.text:
Soul of the product: 100% eco-friendly, sustainable and vegan materials Natural cork provides enhanced grip—even when wet providing non-slip performance High density rubber ensures joint-friendly cushioning Excellent durability, high quality, and free from harmful substances Versatile for regular and hot yoga sessions Anti-microbial cork surface for a hygienic environment Material:

Biodegradable, Recyclable, 100% natural tree rubber, water based inks with premium cork

The best thing: They come from the earth, they go back into the earth! The mat is 100% biodegradable, so by buying it you aren't increasing your carbon footprint.

Care guide: We recommend you clean using a yoga mat cleaner. Wipe it down with a yoga mat cleaner after your practice. Let it Air Dry (Do not put in Dryer) Mindful craftsmanship:

Cork is the outer bark of the Oak Tree. The Oak tree is never cut down to harvest cork, rather the bark is stripped by hand! No part of the bark is wasted during cork production. Oak trees regenerate their bark by absorbing five times more Carbon Dioxide than an oak tree that hasn't been harvested.

The other side of the mat is made with sustainably harvested tree rubber from rubber trees, a renewable resource. These mats don't contain any PVC, EVA or synthetic rubber making your mat both kind to you and kind to the earth.
All designs are made using water-based inks to avoid chemicals

Measurement: >Measurement

items: Cork is the outer bark of the Oak Tree. The Oak tree is never cut down to harvest cork, rather the bark is stripped by hand! No part of the bark is wasted during cork production. Oak trees regenerate their bark by absorbing five times more Carbon Dioxide than an oak tree that hasn't been harvested.

The other side of the mat is made with sustainably harvested tree rubber from rubber trees, a renewable resource. These mats don't contain any PVC, EVA or synthetic rubber making your mat both kind to you and kind to the earth.
All designs are made using water-based inks to avoid chemicals

appendText.text:
Soul of the product: 100% eco-friendly, plant-based, and vegan Sweat-activated grip for non-slip performance Cushioned for joint support with non-slip rubber base Durable, high-quality, and sweat-wicking Free from silicone, phthalates, and harmful chemicals Ideal for hot yoga and high-intensity sessions Material: Biodegradable, Recyclable, 100% natural tree rubber, water based inks with premium Hemp Care guide: We recommend you clean using a yoga mat cleaner. Wipe it down with a yoga mat cleaner after your practice. Let it Air Dry (Do not put in Dryer) Mindful craftsmanship:

Hemp is a “bast fibre” which means it’s derived from the stems of plants such as flax, jute and stinging nettle. Hemp is gentle on the earth as it requires very little water. The other side of the mat is made with sustainably harvested tree rubber from rubber trees, a renewable resource. These mats don't contain any PVC, EVA or synthetic rubber making your mat both kind to you and kind to the earth.

The best thing: They come from the earth, they go back into the earth! The mat is 100% biodegradable, so by buying it you aren't increasing your carbon footprint.
